title: Easter Eggs That Connect All Of American Horror Story Together
author: Looper
comment: Pepper allegedly killed her SISTER's child, but we found out later that it was her sister's husband.
idk why everyone hates on Hotel, i didn't think it was that bad
Madison Montgomery (Coven) and the Mongomery's (Murder House) were definitely tied. Both were able to essentially build Frankensteins.
Is it bad I want another season of Coven? It’s my favorite season tbh.
Someone who doesn't watch AHS would be so confused
description:
If you're new, Subscribe! → http://bit.ly/Subscribe-to-Looper

Each season of American Horror Story has been unique from the rest, but there are still some major common threads running throughout the anthology installments that definitely tie this hit thriller series together. Between recurring characters, locations, and clever references scattered throughout, there are plenty of Easter eggs that connect all six chapters of American Horror Story together...

Familiar faces |
